title: How to Make a Coffee Frappuchino

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need.
steps.description: See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below.

steps.headline: Pour the ice, cooled coffee, skimmed milk, sauce, and sugar into a blender.
steps.description: Use caramel or chocolate sauce to substitute for butterscotch if you'd like.

steps.headline: Blend for about 15 seconds or longer if you'd like.
steps.description: If you like a little more chunks of ice in your frappe, blend for less. If you like it smooth, blend longer.

steps.headline: Top with whipped cream and any sauce of your choice.

text: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need. See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below. Pour the ice, cooled coffee, skimmed milk, sauce, and sugar into a blender. Use caramel or chocolate sauce to substitute for butterscotch if you'd like. Blend for about 15 seconds or longer if you'd like. If you like a little more chunks of ice in your frappe, blend for less. If you like it smooth, blend longer. Top with whipped cream and any sauce of your choice.  Serve into glasses and enjoy!
